official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Postal Reorganization Act and to reenact the former provisions of title 39, United States Code.

summary.text: Repeals the Postal Reorganization Act and reenacts provisions governing postal service which were in effect immediately before the enactment of such Act (thus abolishing the United States Postal Service and the Postal Rate Commission and reestablishing the Post Office Department).

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of the Postal Reorganization Act and to reenact the former provisions of title 39, United States Code.
